name: Eden AI
description: Eden AI provides a unified API to integrate multiple AI models and workflows for developers and businesses.
longDescription: Eden AI is a platform that simplifies the integration of AI technologies by offering a unified API that connects to leading AI providers for tasks like text, image, and speech processing. Its mission is to democratize AI access for businesses worldwide, enabling developers and enterprises to build intelligent applications efficiently. The platform supports a wide range of AI models, allowing users to switch or combine providers to optimize performance and cost. It caters to developers, SaaS platforms, startups, and enterprises by providing pre-built templates and custom API solutions. Eden AI also emphasizes cost transparency and data compliance, ensuring users can manage expenses and adhere to regulations like GDPR. By streamlining AI integration, it reduces complexity and accelerates time-to-market for AI-driven projects.
features: Unified API connects to multiple AI providers, simplifying integration for diverse AI functionalities.
Pre-built workflow templates accelerate development for use cases like document parsing and content moderation.
Custom AI API development tailors solutions to specific business logic or data requirements.
Cost monitoring tools provide real-time insights into AI usage and expenses across providers.
Supports over 100 AI models, enabling easy switching or combining for optimal performance.
No-code workflow builder allows users to create and deploy AI workflows without coding expertise.
GDPR-compliant hosting options, including on-premise for enterprise plans, ensure data privacy.
Batch Processing API handles large datasets with minimal latency for efficient data processing.
Integration with platforms like Make, Bubble, and Zapier streamlines AI-driven automation.
Transparent pricing lets users pay only for API calls at vendor rates without monthly commitments.

faqs.question: What is Eden AI?
faqs.answer: Eden AI is a platform that provides a unified API to integrate various AI models for tasks like text, image, and speech processing, simplifying development for businesses and developers.

faqs.question: Does Eden AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Eden AI offers $10 in free credits upon signup, allowing users to test AI APIs without a credit card.

faqs.question: Can I use my existing AI provider accounts with Eden AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can integrate your own API keys from providers like OpenAI to leverage Eden AI’s platform while using existing accounts.

faqs.question: How does Eden AI ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: Eden AI is GDPR-compliant, acts as a gateway without storing data, and offers on-premise hosting for enterprise plans.

faqs.question: What types of AI tasks can Eden AI handle?
faqs.answer: Eden AI supports tasks like generative AI, natural language processing, speech recognition, document parsing, and image/video generation.

faqs.question: How does cost monitoring work on Eden AI?
faqs.answer: Eden AI’s cost monitoring tools provide real-time insights, set budget limits, and allow exporting of expense reports in CSV format.

faqs.question: Can I build custom AI workflows with Eden AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, Eden AI’s workflow builder lets users create custom workflows by combining AI models, data, and tools, with pre-built templates for quick starts.

faqs.question: Is coding required to use Eden AI?
faqs.answer: No, Eden AI offers no-code options through its workflow builder and integrations with platforms like Make and Zapier.
